entry.title: Doyon SM402NA - 40 Qt. General Purpose Planetary Mixer - 208-240V, 1.5 HP, 14 Amps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Planetary Mixer
Price: 6287.00

The Doyon SM300 is a general purpose planetary mixer suited for a variety of products. Its quiet design and compact size allows it to fit into almost any area of your business. It is a versatile mixer that can handle a variety of products from cakes to cookies, to meatloaf, mashed potatoes or classic yeast breads.

It has a 30 quart capacity which can cold about 15 pounds of dough at a 50% absorption ratio. It is a 120 volt machine at 16 amps, with a NEMA 5-20 plug. Doyon is known throughout the bakery industry for their high-attention to detail and uncompromising standards. 

To determine the absorption ratio (AR) of dough, divide the weight of the water by the weight of the flour. For an example: let's calculate the absorption ratio of a mixture containing 10 pounds of flour and 5 pounds of water: 5 / 10 = 0.50. That means it has a 50% absorption ratio. For more information on this item, check out Doyon's brochure for the SM series. 

      • Small footprint with quiet operation and ingredient chute
      • #12 driven hub (meat grinder and slicer sold separately)
      • Easy controls with timer, 3 speeds and separate start and emergency stop
      • High torque transmission
      • Thermally protected motor to reduce wear and tear
      • Includes bowl, hook, beater and whip
      • 40 quart capacity

CAPACITY

Product Max weight of finish product
Dough, Bread or Roll 60% AR 40 lb (18 kg)
Dough, Bread or Roll 50% AR 30 lb (13.6 kg)
Dough, Whole Wheat, Bread or Roll 70% AR 40 lb (18 kg)
Brownie Batter 40 (18 kg)
Cookie Dough 30 lb (13.6 kg)
Meat Loaf 30 lb (13.6 kg)
Dough, Shortcrust Pastry 40 lb (18 kg)


SPECS

Brand Doyon
Model SM402NA
Dimensions (WDH) 22" x 26.5" x 40.5"
Capacity 40 quarts
Dough Capacity 30 lb at 50% AR
Speeds 90, 170, 310 RPM
Motor 1.5 HP
Electrical 208-240v, 14 amps, 1 Ph, 60 Hz
Plug NEMA 6-20P
Certifications cETLus, ETL

WARRANTY

One year parts warranty, two year labour warranty.

entry.title: Waring Commercial WSM20L - 20 Qt. Planetary Mixer - 1 HP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Planetary Mixer
Price: 3231.00

The Waring Commercial WSM20L is a professional countertop mixer (sometimes called a stand mixer). It is part of their heavy-duty "Luna Series" of planetary mixers. It is a 20 quart mixer designed for use in high-traffic cafes and restaurant kitchens, equipped with a powerful 1 horsepower motor and 3 speeds.

The Waring WSM20L can handle a wide variety of foods: you can power through mashed potatoes, meats, doughs, or batters. You can prep for baked goods, deserts, or main courses — bread, bagels or pasta. This mixer comes with all the necessary attachments: chef's whisk, mixing paddle, and a dough hook. It has a gear-driven transmission and thermal overload protection to keep this thing running in your kitchen for years to come.

      • Large, 20-quart stainless steel bowl with stainless steel handle
      • Heavy duty, 1 HP induction motor
      • Side-mounted controls
      • 3 mixing speeds
      • Heavy-duty bowl-lift lever
      • Gear driven, permanent lube transmission
      • Thermal overload protection
      • Includes stainless steel bowl, chef‘s whisk, dough hook and aluminum mixing paddle
      • Specifically designed for countertop use
      • Non-slip rubber feet

VIDEO

SPECS

Model WSM20L
Weight 203 lb
Dimensions (WDH) 21.8" x 21.8" x 28.7"
Capacity 20 quarts
Approvals cETLus, NSF
Voltage 120
Watts 1100
Amps 14
Plug NEMA 5-15P
Cord Length 6 feet

entry.title: Hamilton Beach Commercial CPM800 - 8 Qt. Planetary Mixer - 120v, 800w, 7 Amps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamilton Beach
Type: Planetary Mixer
Price: 1116.00

Hamilton Beach Commercial's CPM800 is an 8 quart countertop mixer built for versatility for all kinds of foodservice kitchens. This mixer has a variable seven speed dial and pulse, a die-cast aluminum body, an 8 quart (8 litre) stainless steel bowl, and a BPA-free plastic bowl guard.

It has a tilt-back head that makes it easy to add ingredients, scrape the sides, change attachments, or remove the bowl. It comes with heavy-duty attachments: a stainless steel dough hook, beater & wire whisk, with splash shield to keep ingredients away from the hub area.

This small yet powerful commercial stand mixer is designed for more than just small bakeries and pastry shops. It's often used in chain and independent restaurants, healthcare, catering operations, and more. It's used to make anything from whipped, cream, meringues, frosting, mashed potatoes, to pancake batter.

      • Tilt-back head
      • All-metal gears
      • 8 quart stainless steel bowl
      • Die-cast aluminum body
      • Variable 7 speed dial and pulse
      • BPA-free plastic bowl guard

entry.title: Hobart N50 - 5 Qt. Planetary Mixer - 120v, 1/6 HP, 2.9 Amps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hobart
Type: Planetary Mixer
Price: 4443.00

The Hobart N50 5-quart mixer is a small but mighty planetary mixer, designed for culinary schools, small bakeries, restaurants, and other smaller applications. It has a heavy-duty, American-made motor with a gear-driven transmission, for years of trouble-free, consistent use.

It has a 1/6 horsepower, fixed-speed motor, with three speeds (60, 124, 255 attachment RPM). This is an easy to operate machine with large, easy to reach controls: the shift handles is located right next to the intentionally large On/Off switch. The operator simply picks the speed the mix calls for and activates the On switch.

It goes without saying that Hobart makes some of the best mixers in the industry. They invented the planetary mixer after all! So this is a top-quality machine, made in America, backed by a great warranty, with some of the best customer service in the industry.

      • Made in America — a top quality mixer
      • Five-quart all-purpose mixer with bowl, beater, whip & dough Hook included
      • 1⁄6-horsepower Hobart-designed fixed-speed motor
      • Available in Hobart Gray
      • Three fixed speeds
      • Large, easy-to-reach controls

      • Cord and plug

entry.title: Omcan MX-IT-0025 - Dough Fork Mixer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 9888.00

Omcan's MX-IT-0025 is a single-speed dough fork mixer -- otherwise known as an oblique mixer. This mixer is popular amidst European circles, and really anyone who takes a more traditional approach to baking. In light of some of the other mixers available on the market right now, one of the biggest appeals of a fork mixer comes down to familiarity (i.e. if you were trained on one when you started into baking).

This fork mixer comes with a built-in timer to control the mixing process. This helps you optimize your workflow by setting the machine to mix whilst you go off to and finish whatever else needs to be done. And as a single speed model, you don't have to worry about inconsistent results! Just set the mixer to your desired time and you're set.

The MX-IT-0025 consists of a stainless steel bowl, fork, holder shaft, and bowl guard. The body itself is crafted from powder-coated steel, and it consists of a motor and trapezoidal belts. There's also two reduction gears that work apart from the bowl and fork. All of this mixer's rotating parts are assembled on ball bearings. This model can knead a max of 25 kilograms of dough.

      • 1 speed
      • Built-in timer
      • Stainless steel bowl, fork, holder shaft, and bowl guard
      • Powder-coated steel exterior
      • 25 kg of dough max working capacity
      • Made in Italy
      • NSF certified

entry.title: Eurodib - Spiral Mixer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eurodib
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 1341.00 - 12545.00 (7 variants)

These Eurodib LM and Eurodib LR GM spiral mixers come in a variety of sizes, and can be ordered with either 1 speed or 2 speeds. As spiral mixers, they are specifically designed for bakeries, pizza shops, and pastry shops -- large foodservice operations that need to mix a wide variety of dough. From stiff doughs with low-hydration, to doughs with high-hydration (like ciabatta breads and pizza dough), spiral mixers can do it all.

The Eurodib LM and Eurodib LR GM spiral mixers come with a built in timer, which will allow you to program and set mixing times for various products. It includes a emergency stop and bowl guard switch for safety. 

      • Can mix variety of doughs: pizza dough, bread dough, pie dough, mixing scones, and biscuit dough
      • 1 speed or 2 speed machines
      • Built-in timer

entry.title: Doyon - Spiral Mixer with Removable Bowl
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 69172.00 - 95258.00 (4 variants)

The Doyon spiral mixer with removable bowl comes in two sizes: one with a 225 quart bowl (160 kg. dough capacity), and the other with a 330 quart bowl (235 kg. dough capacity). It can come with the standard white enamel, or an optional stainless steel finish. These mixers are great for bagels, breads, pizza dough, and gentle French-style dough. Download Doyon's brochure for more information.

The bowl comes on casters and can easily be removed from the mixing system, using the bowl dolly's handles. This mixer will give you proper dough oxygenation, rotation speed, and synchronization of the bowl and hook. They have a unique stainless steel bowl design with a high centre that eliminates dough feeder post, and it eliminates friction and increases water absorption, which prevents overheating for longer yeast viability and better gluten development.

      • Easy to use digital controls with 2 speeds and 9 programmable speed/time settings; automatically switch from speed 1 to speed 2; jog and reverse
      • Bowl drain for easy cleaning
      • Two independent motors with non-slipping belt for tough mixes
      • Superior torque transmission eliminates vibration and noise
      • Ideal for dough with a minimum of 45% hydration
      • Standard white enamel or optional stainless steel finish

entry.title: Doyon - Tilt Over Spiral Mixer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 63334.00 - 104312.00 (36 variants)

Doyon's hydraulic tilt over spiral mixers are the perfect machine for high-volume dough production. They come in three different sizes, from a dough capacity of 124 kilograms, to 235 kilograms. Each model can be ordered in left-dumping or right-dumping, and they can be ordered in three different drop heights.

These machines are going to give you perfect oxygenation, rotational speed, and synchronization of the bowl and hook -- all of these are crucial elements in making the best dough possible. They are great machines for breads, bagels, pizza, and gentle French-style dough.

Doyon's unique stainless steel bowl has a high centre that eliminates dough feeder post. It eliminates friction and increases water absorption and prevents overheating for longer yeast viability and better gluten development.

        • Left-lifting or right-lifting versions
        • Easy to use digital controls with 2 speeds
        • 9 programmable speed and time settings
        • Automatically switches from speed 1 to speed 2
        • Jog and reverse functions
        • Drain for easy bowl cleaning
        • Two independent motors with non-slipping belt for tough mixes
        • Superior torque transmission eliminates vibration and noise
        • Standard white enamel or optional stainless steel finish

entry.title: Doyon AEF - Spiral Mixer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 11581.00 - 37687.00 (8 variants)

Doyon's AEF series of spiral mixers feature a powerful belt-driven motor with overload protection for the highest reliability and efficiency, while keeping maintenance costs down. These spiral mixers come with 2 mixing speeds, and can automatically switch from one to other. The bowl has a drain for easy cleaning, and the design of the bowl will prevent overheating your dough, and it will promote better yeast viability, and better gluten development.

These mixers are some of the best mixers out there for bread dough. Their smart design and high-horsepower are going to produce dough with a better consistency and temperature, so they are perfect for large batches of bread dough. Check out the Doyon brochure for more information. Or download the capacity chart. 

      • Easy to use digital controls with 2 speeds
      • 9 programmable options speed and time settings
      • Automatically switches from speed 1 to speed 2
      • 3 to 10 minute mixing time depending on type of dough
      • Unique stainless steel bowl with high center that eliminates dough feeder post; reduces friction and increases water absorption
      • Bowl and hook synchronization
      • Two independent motors with non-slipping belt for tough mixes
      • Overload protection
      • Mounted on casters for greater mobility
      • The superior torque transmission eliminates vibration and noise

entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 3174.00 - 11679.00 (4 variants)

These two-speed mixers are designed to have the mixer and bowl revolve simultaneously to provide efficient mixing. They are equipped with safety covers. Easy to operate and clean. These mixers are especially suitable for bakeries, hotels, pastry shops, and restaurants. They are 220 volt, with 3 phase power.

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

entry.title: Omcan - Elite Series Spiral Mixer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 2510.00 - 16263.00 (13 variants)

The Omcan "Elite Series" of spiral mixers was made entirely in Italy. They have a stainless steel bowl, a fixed stainless steel high strength shaft, as well as a safety device which stops the machine when the bowl cover is lifted. This machine will greatly reduce the usual mixing time of traditional machines. Ideal for bakeries and pizza shops, they perform well with both hard and soft dough.

These mixers are available in a number of sizes and electrical configurations. Some are single speed and others are two speed; some are 1 phase and others are 3 phase. See the spec sheet for full details.

The models that are 50 kg. and above ship for free.

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Primo PSM - Spiral Mixer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Primo
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 6926.00 - 16783.00 (5 variants)

The Primo PSM spiral mixers are tough and durable dough mixers. Each model will have a safety guard, dough hook, kneading bar, and bowl -- all made of stainless steel. They can knead both small and large quantities of dough perfectly. Check out the capacity chart. 

These mixers can run in three different modes: manual mode, where the timers are disabled; semi-automatic mode, where the mixer will operate in either 1st or 2nd speed; or finally, automatic mode, where the machine automatically switches from 1st to 2nd speed and stops once the set time has elapsed.

      • The direction of bowl rotation can be reversed to facilitate dough removal.
      • Front and rear casters allow for easy movement
      • Standard components: telemecanique, Italian timer
      • Length of power cord is 8.5 ft
      • Safety guard, dough hook, kneading bar, and bowl are made of stainless steel.
      • 208 volts, 60 hertz, 3 phase
      • ETL listed

entry.title: BakeMax BMSM - Spiral Mixer
entry.summary:
Vendor: BakeMax
Type: Spiral Mixer
Price: 6090.00 - 20240.00 (7 variants)

The BakeMax BMSM series of spiral mixers has been designed for heavy dough, specifically for bakeries, pizzeria, and pasta shops. It has a heavy-duty, long-lasting stainless steel bowl with dough capacities from 20 kg to 320 kg.

These machines have dual-direction mixing technology where the speed is synchronized with a reverse-rotating bowl to mix ingredients and blend the dough hydraulically downward, which keeps dough cooler and achieves desired results more efficiently.

      • Bowl may be set to rotate either forward or backward, which can help with removing the product
      • High-efficiency, 2-speed mixing achieves through blending ingredients to achieve desired results consistently within 7-10 minutes.
      • Includes two 30 minute timers that automatically control mixing time
      • Machine is still operational even if timer is interrupted.
      • Minimal-Maintenance, high-power motor
      • Speed is altered without shifting gear.
      • 220 volts, 3 phase, hard wired (Single phase converters available upon request for the BMSM020, BMSM030 and BMSM040)
      • Two year warranty

entry.title: Doyon BTL140 - 140 Qt. Planetary Mixer with Power Bowl Lift - 208-240v, 5 HP, 20 Amps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Planetary Mixer
Price: 50118.00

Doyon's high-volume BTL0140 features a quiet belt-driven 5-horsepower motor that will give you incredible strength, reliability, and the ability to increase or decrease the mixing speed without stopping the mixer. The BTL mixer series comes standard with a hydraulic bowl lifting system.

The belt-driven system and overload protection are going to give you the highest reliability and efficiency for a planetary mixer, all while keeping maintenance costs extremely low. This mixer comes with an incredible 20 mixing speeds, a slow ramp up feature, and seven programmable speed and time settings for your most used recipes. For more information on this mixer, read Doyon's brochure.

      • Comes with bowl, dough hook, flat beater, and whip -- all stainless steel
      • 20 speeds with slow start feature
      • Fixed belt with variable speed motor is extremely durable, virtually maintenance free, and very quiet
      • 7 programs for speed and time
      • 99 minute mixing timer
      • Slow start -- won't make a mess if you start in speed 20. It will slowly increase to speed 20
      • Change speeds while mixing (which can help avoid deflating meringues and whipped creams)
      • Hydraulic bowl lifting system 
      • Four stationary casters: the mixers are easier to move for cleaning

VIDEO

DOUGH CAPACITIES

entry.title: Doyon BTF060 - 63 Qt. Planetary Mixer - 208-240v, 4 HP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Planetary Mixer
Price: 15529.00

The Doyon "BTF060" 63 quart planetary mixer is one of the most powerful mixers in this size range. It features a 4-horsepower, non-slipping belt-driven motor, with enough torque and durability for tough mixes, but also with enough precision and control to produce perfect meringues and whipped items. It has overload protection, which will give you incredibly reliability, efficiency, and the lowest possible maintenance cost.

This is a highly-advanced, top of the line mixer, with 20 mixing speeds and a 99 minute timer for absolute mixing precision. They BTF060 is ideal for operations that need to mix bread dough, as well as other items, like cake batter, meatloaf, whipped items, sauces, and much more. For more information on this mixer, read Doyon's brochure.

      • Comes with bowl, dough hook, flat beater, whip, and safety guard -- all stainless steel
      • 20 speeds and seven programmable speed and time settings for your most used recipes
      • Non-slipping belt-drive, which is durable, reliable, and easy to replace
      • 99-minute digital timer that is easy to use
      • Slow start up -- won't make a mess if you start at speed 20, but will slowly increase up to speed 20
      • No need to stop mixer to change speeds

Two year parts, and one year labour warranty.

entry.title: Doyon BTF010 - 10 Qt. Planetary Mixer - 120v, 0.5 HP, 4 Amps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doyon
Type: Planetary Mixer
Price: 6858.00

The Doyon "BTF010" 10 quart planetary mixer is one of the most powerful mixers in this size range. It features a 1/2-horsepower, non-slipping belt-driven motor, with enough torque and durability for tough mixes, but also with enough precision and control to produce perfect meringues and whipped items. It has overload protection, which will give you incredibly reliability, efficiency, and the lowest possible maintenance cost.

This is a highly-advanced, top of the line mixer, with 20 mixing speeds and a 99 minute timer for absolute mixing precision. They BTF010 is ideal for operations that need to mix bread dough, as well as other items, like cake batter, meatloaf, whipped items, sauces, and much more. For more information on this mixer, read Doyon's brochure.

      • Comes with bowl, dough hook, flat beater, whip, and safety guard -- all stainless steel
      • 20 speeds and seven programmable speed and time settings for your most used recipes
      • Non-slipping belt-drive, which is durable, reliable, and easy to replace
      • 99-minute digital timer that is easy to use
      • Slow start up -- won't make a mess if you start at speed 20, but will slowly increase up to speed 20
      • No need to stop mixer to change speeds
      • Quiet operation
      • Cast iron frame with enamel coated steel finish
      • Bench or floor model

VIDEO

DOUGH CAPACITIES

Dough, Bread or Roll 60% AR 10 lb (4.5 kg)
Dough, Whole Wheat 70% AR 10 lb (4.5 kg)
